# Chain type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Chain = {
  id: number;
  name: AddEthereumChainParameter["chainName"];
  nativeCurrency?: AddEthereumChainParameter["nativeCurrency"];
  rpcUrls: AddEthereumChainParameter["rpcUrls"];
  blockExplorers?: {
    name: string;
    url: string;
  }[];
  testnet?: boolean;
};
```
